Title: Risk analysis and comparative study of the different cloud computing providers in Indonesia
Source title: Proceedings - International Conference on Cloud Computing and Social Networking 2012: Cloud Computing and Social Networking for Smart and Productive Society, ICCCSN 2012
Affiliations: SWISS GERMAN UNIVERSITY, Edutown, BSD CITY, Tangerang 15339, Indonesia; BINUS UNIVERSITY, Jakarta, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Lim, C., SWISS GERMAN UNIVERSITY, Edutown, BSD CITY, Tangerang 15339, Indonesia; Suparman, A., BINUS UNIVERSITY, Jakarta, Indonesia
Abstract: The objective of this research is to evaluate the risk of cloud computing in Indonesia. Risk assessment is conducted on the system and recommendation of control is provided to help cloud provider in Indonesia to reduce risks. The assessment result should increase level of awareness to threats in cloud environment and help consumers to choose the right cloud providers. At the end, this paper can be used as a guide for Indonesian government to prepare the required infrastructure by cloud providers to run their business in Indonesia. © 2012 IEEE.
Author Keywords: Cloud computing; Cloud security; Data centre; Risk assessment
Index Keywords: Cloud providers; Comparative studies; Data centres; Indonesia; Risk assessment; Cloud computing
